query:
UPDATE evidences 
SET 
  box1Content = REPLACE(REPLACE(box1Content, '.;', ''), ';', ''),
  box2Content = REPLACE(REPLACE(box2Content, '.;', ''), ';', ''),
  box3Content = REPLACE(REPLACE(box3Content, '.;', ''), ';', ''),
  box4Content = REPLACE(REPLACE(box4Content, '.;', ''), ';', ''),
  box5Content = REPLACE(REPLACE(box5Content, '.;', ''), ';', ''),
  box6Content = REPLACE(REPLACE(box6Content, '.;', ''), ';', '')
WHERE 
  box1Content LIKE '%.;%' 
  OR box2Content LIKE '%.;%'
  OR box3Content LIKE '%.;%'
  OR box4Content LIKE '%.;%'
  OR box5Content LIKE '%.;%'
  OR box6Content LIKE '%.;%';

  box2Content = REPLACE(REPLACE(box2Content, '.;', ''), ';', ''),

  box4Content = REPLACE(REPLACE(box4Content, '.;', ''), ';', ''),

  box6Content = REPLACE(REPLACE(box6Content, '.;', ''), ';', '')
WHERE 
  box1Content LIKE '%.;%' 
  OR box2Content LIKE '%.;%'
  OR box3Content LIKE '%.;%'
  OR box4Content LIKE '%.;%'
  OR box5Content LIKE '%.;%'
  OR box6Content LIKE '%.;%';
